wordpressPost.title: Weird feeds
wordpressPost.content:
Hello anyone subscribed via a feed reader. This isn’t a real post, just a quick note to all of you who have been complaining about repeated posts.

Over the past week or so I moved my feed over to feedburner. While doing that things went wrong and I spammed all of you with a few tens of repeated posts.

Oops.

Then two days ago I finally figured out how to convince feedburner to use a full feed instead of excerpts. This lead to more spamming and I’m told some people are now receiving each post twice.

If you’re one of the people having issues, I suggest you replace your subscriptions with this link:

http://feeds.feedburner.com/AGeekWithAHat2

That is the direct real feed now so hopefully there won’t be any problems ðŸ™‚
